answers.answer: Good luck and hope everything goes safely and smoothly for you!
Were you already dilated at all before you got to the hospital? How far long are you?
Supposedly i was 1and half dialated on my own but now with two dose of the inducing pills i am now 4and half

question: So last night i had to come to the hospital to be induced...because they found out i have preeclampsia and show no sign wat so ever...first they try that ballon thing didnt work so they give me the pill now my contractions are too frequent...imma try this bouncy ball thing to sctusl get myself to dialate...just cant wait to have my little peanut
title: being induced
